ControlBlock.Description: One dimensional look-up table with selectable number of data points. Table data must be an array of size DimX. If input is out of specified range, output will be cut off (no extrapolation).

MaskParameter.Name: DimX
MaskParameter.Description: Number of data points in x-direction

MaskParameter.Name: x_min
MaskParameter.Description: Minimum input value of x-dimension for look-up table.

MaskParameter.Name: x_max
MaskParameter.Description: Maximum input value of x-dimension for look-up table.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Table
ImplementationParameter.Description: Lookup table content

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for x dimension

ImplementationParameter.Name: maskX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Bitmask for fracture part of x dimension.

ImplementationParameter.Name: idxOffsetX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Index offset for table data in x dimension

ImplementationParameter.Name: gainX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Input scaling for dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: gainXsfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for input scaling in dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: offsetX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Input offset value for dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: minX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Lower range limit of dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: maxX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Upper range limit of dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: Table
ImplementationParameter.Description: Lookup table content

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for x dimension

ImplementationParameter.Name: maskX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Bitmask for fracture part of x dimension.

ImplementationParameter.Name: idxOffsetX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Index offset for table data in x dimension

ImplementationParameter.Name: gainX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Input scaling for dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: gainXsfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for input scaling in dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: offsetX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Input offset value for dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: minX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Lower range limit of dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: maxX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Upper range limit of dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: Table
ImplementationParameter.Description: Lookup table content

ImplementationParameter.Name: dimX
ImplementationParameter.Description: X dimension of table

ImplementationParameter.Name: gainX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Input scaling for dimension x

ImplementationParameter.Name: offsetX
ImplementationParameter.Description: Input offset value for dimension x
